remarks: Two functionals with kernels in a subset relationship.  (Contributed by NM, 17-Feb-2015.)  (New usage is discouraged.)
statement:
lkrss2.s $e |- S = ( Scalar ` W ) $.
lkrss2.r $e |- R = ( Base ` S ) $.
lkrss2.f $e |- F = ( LFnl ` W ) $.
lkrss2.k $e |- K = ( LKer ` W ) $.
lkrss2.d $e |- D = ( LDual ` W ) $.
lkrss2.t $e |- .x. = ( .s ` D ) $.
lkrss2.w $e |- ( ph -> W e. LVec ) $.
lkrss2.g $e |- ( ph -> G e. F ) $.
lkrss2.h $e |- ( ph -> H e. F ) $.
lkrss2N $p |- ( ph -> ( ( K ` G ) C_ ( K ` H ) <-> E. r e. R H = ( r .x. G ) ) ) $.
$d .x. r $.
$d F r $.
$d G r $.
$d H r $.
$d K r $.
$d R r $.
$d S r $.
$d W r $.
$d ph r $.
